# NSFocusRingType

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe the style of the focus ring.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NSFocusRingType
```

## Overview

The focus ring type is used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell] to configure whether and how a control draws its focus ring.

## Constants

- **NSFocusRingType.default**: The default focus ring type for a view or cell.
- **NSFocusRingType.none**: No focus ring.
- **NSFocusRingType.exterior**: The standard Aqua focus ring.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Drawing Focus Rings

- **set()**: Specifies how the system draws the focus ring.
- **NSFocusRingPlacement**: Constants that indicate how the system draws the focus ring.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
